Detach a conjunction of truths in a biconditional.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2011.)

 Detach a conjunction of truths in a biconditional.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 9-Jan-2015.)
statement:
mpbir3an.1 $e |- ps $.
mpbir3an.2 $e |- ch $.
mpbir3an.3 $e |- th $.
mpbir3an.4 $e |- ( ph <-> ( ps /\ ch /\ th ) ) $.
mpbir3an $p |- ph $.
